title.narrative: Caritas Turkey: Support for Refugees and Migrants in Istanbul

description.narrative: Refugee and Migrants Services (RMS) Project is the core project of an ongoing Program (Refugee and Migrants Service Program) of Caritas Turkey since 1991. Responding to basic material and education/socialization needs with a wide range of services, the Project contributed to improve the socio-economic living conditions of thousands of refugees and migrants in Istanbul. This project reference concerns the third year of the project. The general objective of this project is to improve social, economic and psychological living conditions of refugees and migrants in Istanbul.
